job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Are you a seasoned software engineer with a deep interest in AI? Trilogy is on the lookout for exceptional engineers to lead the charge in adopting generative AI tools both in our development process and into our products.

   Join us to work on our exciting product portfolio:
     * TeachTap: Bringing historical figures to life using AI, offering an engaging, TikTok-like learning experience to make learning more relevant and fun.
     * Educational Content Generation: Utilizing the latest in generative AI combined with comprehensive learning materials to create captivating content.
     * TeachTower: A game-based motivation system inspired by popular games like Roblox and Minecraft, designed to make learning irresistibly fun.
     * Coachbot: A learning copilot that integrates with existing apps, guiding learning paths, recommending next steps, and rewarding daily progress.

   Your role will focus on integrating AI into engineering practices, using AI tools to increase efficiency and solve engineering tasks like coding and testing. Based on the obtained results, you will derive recipes and playbooks to be adopted by the broader engineering team. Maintaining high-quality standards in our codebases while ensuring high leverage of AI tools across our engineering teams will be a key part of your work.

   You will be an integral part of our existing engineering team, working collaboratively on our suite of products to deeply understand our environment and needs. You will have the freedom to propose and experiment with new tools and then will leverage the insights and experiences obtained to evolve our processes, advocate for new tool adoption, or even spearhead the creation of small tools, bots, and frameworks to enhance our technical setup.

   We seek candidates with a strong background in software engineering and a capacity for adapting to new technologies. Moreover, an interest in the latest generative AI developments and a drive for innovation are crucial. While our primary tech stack is AWS Serverless with TypeScript, we're looking for versatile engineers who can excel in a variety of technical environments and challenges.

   What you will be doing

     * Developing fully functional features, using AI tools to expedite delivery and enhance quality.
     * Performing experiments with AI to enhance engineering processes, including decomposition, solution design, code generation, and troubleshooting.
     * Documenting best practices and techniques in guides that enable others to harness the power of generative AI effectively.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Building new AI models from scratch; instead, your focus will be on leveraging and fine-tuning existing models to maximize efficiency.
     * Being confined to outdated technologies; we encourage an environment that thrives on dynamic tech stacks, fostering continuous innovation., * Drive transformative change by establishing a framework that seamlessly integrates generative AI, significantly amplifying engineering productivity.
job_details.full_text:
Lead Software Engineer, LearnwithAI (Remote) - $200,000/year USD

Are you a seasoned software engineer with a deep interest in AI? Trilogy is on the lookout for exceptional engineers to lead the charge in adopting generative AI tools both in our development process and into our products.

   Join us to work on our exciting product portfolio:
     * TeachTap: Bringing historical figures to life using AI, offering an engaging, TikTok-like learning experience to make learning more relevant and fun.
     * Educational Content Generation: Utilizing the latest in generative AI combined with comprehensive learning materials to create captivating content.
     * TeachTower: A game-based motivation system inspired by popular games like Roblox and Minecraft, designed to make learning irresistibly fun.
     * Coachbot: A learning copilot that integrates with existing apps, guiding learning paths, recommending next steps, and rewarding daily progress.

   Your role will focus on integrating AI into engineering practices, using AI tools to increase efficiency and solve engineering tasks like coding and testing. Based on the obtained results, you will derive recipes and playbooks to be adopted by the broader engineering team. Maintaining high-quality standards in our codebases while ensuring high leverage of AI tools across our engineering teams will be a key part of your work.

   You will be an integral part of our existing engineering team, working collaboratively on our suite of products to deeply understand our environment and needs. You will have the freedom to propose and experiment with new tools and then will leverage the insights and experiences obtained to evolve our processes, advocate for new tool adoption, or even spearhead the creation of small tools, bots, and frameworks to enhance our technical setup.

   We seek candidates with a strong background in software engineering and a capacity for adapting to new technologies. Moreover, an interest in the latest generative AI developments and a drive for innovation are crucial. While our primary tech stack is AWS Serverless with TypeScript, we're looking for versatile engineers who can excel in a variety of technical environments and challenges.

   What you will be doing

     * Developing fully functional features, using AI tools to expedite delivery and enhance quality.
     * Performing experiments with AI to enhance engineering processes, including decomposition, solution design, code generation, and troubleshooting.
     * Documenting best practices and techniques in guides that enable others to harness the power of generative AI effectively.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Building new AI models from scratch; instead, your focus will be on leveraging and fine-tuning existing models to maximize efficiency.
     * Being confined to outdated technologies; we encourage an environment that thrives on dynamic tech stacks, fostering continuous innovation., * Drive transformative change by establishing a framework that seamlessly integrates generative AI, significantly amplifying engineering productivity.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes integrating generative AI tools into products and development processes, focusing on leveraging and fine-tuning existing models rather than building new ones from scratch. Key responsibilities include developing features using AI tools, experimenting with AI for engineering processes (coding, testing), and creating documentation and playbooks for AI adoption. The projects described, such as TeachTap (bringing historical figures to life with AI) and Coachbot (a learning copilot), are direct applications of generative AI. While strong software engineering skills are required, the core focus is on applying and building around GenAI technologies, aligning with the definition of a GenAI Engineer.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves 'developing fully functional features' and integrating AI into products, which are core software development activities. The mention of 'AWS Serverless with TypeScript' as the primary tech stack also points to traditional software engineering.

The description mentions 'building and maintaining production-grade security-aware user-facing software systems' as a core responsibility for GenAI Engineers, and this role focuses on integrating AI into products like TeachTap and Coachbot.
job_tasks.phrase: integrating generative AI tools both in our development process and into our products

job_tasks.justification: The role requires building and maintaining production-grade systems, which is a key aspect of software development, especially when integrating complex AI features.
job_tasks.phrase: Building and maintaining production-grade security-aware user-facing software systems

job_tasks.justification: The job explicitly states 'leveraging and fine-tuning existing models to maximize efficiency' and 'Performing experiments with AI to enhance engineering processes, including decomposition, solution design, code generation, and troubleshooting,' which falls under adapting and utilizing generative models.
The description mentions 'Utilizing the latest in generative AI' for content creation and 'bringing historical figures to life using AI,' which are direct applications of generative modeling.
job_tasks.phrase: Utilizing the latest in generative AI

job_tasks.justification: The role involves experimenting with AI for various engineering tasks, including code generation and troubleshooting, which implies working with and adapting generative models.
job_tasks.phrase: Performing experiments with AI to enhance engineering processes, including decomposition, solution design, code generation, and troubleshooting

job_tasks.justification: The role involves deriving 'recipes and playbooks to be adopted by the broader engineering team' and establishing a 'framework that seamlessly integrates generative AI, significantly amplifying engineering productivity,' which relates to operationalizing and scaling AI usage.
job_tasks.phrase: deriving recipes and playbooks to be adopted by the broader engineering team

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'advocate for new tool adoption, or even spearhead the creation of small tools, bots, and frameworks to enhance our technical setup,' which involves operationalizing and improving the AI-driven technical environment.
job_tasks.phrase: advocate for new tool adoption, or even spearhead the creation of small tools, bots, and frameworks to enhance our technical setup

job_tasks.justification: The role requires understanding the 'exciting product portfolio' and how AI can be used to make learning 'more relevant and fun' and 'irresistibly fun,' indicating a need to align AI applications with product goals and user experience.
job_tasks.phrase: make learning more relevant and fun

job_tasks.justification: The role involves understanding the 'broader engineering team's' needs and processes to implement AI tools and best practices.
job_tasks.phrase: to be adopted by the broader engineering team
